channel.title: "You dont have java installed"
channel.description:
Okay this is really getting me frustrated so if u can please respond.
When I click compile.bat on my source folder a cmd window appears and says i dont have java installed. I do have JDK update 12 also with JDE, so i am confused. For enviormental variables These are my codes i put in: -Path- -C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;-
and -CLASSPATH- -CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;-
Any have a souloution? BTW I have windows xp

item.title: "You dont have java installed"
item.dc:creator: @sarranmanuno sarranmanuno
item.description:
@sarranmanuno wrote:

Okay this is really getting me frustrated so if u can please respond.

When I click compile.bat on my source folder a cmd window appears and says i dont have java installed. I do have JDK update 12 also with JDE, so i am confused. For enviormental variables These are my codes i put in:
-Path-

and

-CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;-
